name: 1-Click Jumper Boy
description:
A short and a little bit hard mouse only platformer I made for my first Game Jam.

  • Use the mouse to move or stop and left-click to jump
  • Avoid the water and the enemies
  • Pick all the fruits to unlock the ? block
  • Touch the ? block to unlock the ! block
  • Touch the ! block to go next level

Hope you enjoy :)

Credits:

Game by mattks92
Art by RottingPixels and analogstudios_
Music by SubspaceAudio and Wolfgang
Sound FX byphoenix1291 and crazyduckgames
Font by jeti
